GR13goramaru:2: * yac candraprabhavaṃ varāmbaragataṃ yal liṅgasaṃjñaṃ jalaṃ sa prāṇas tadadhaḥ sthiraṃ ca kamalaṃ dhatte mukhordhvaṃ hṛdi // 1.1
GR13goramaru:3: * baddhvā kumbhakam ātmagāḍharacitaṃ tad brahmanāḍīgataṃ hy ānetuṃ vadane ṣaḍadhvagakalā saivaṃvidhā sāraṇā // 1.2]
GR13goramaru:6: * saṃprāptaṃ hanurandhramūlavidhinā yac candratoyaṃ mukhe tat sarvaṃ ravikālarūpasadane rakṣet parā sāraṇā // 2.2]
GR13goramaru:8: * nṛtyan nityordhvajihvo yadi pibati pumān vaktradhārāmṛtaughaṃ susvādaṃ śītalāṅgaṃ duritabhayaharaṃ kṣutpipāsāvināśi // 3.1
GR13goramaru:9: * piṇḍasthairyaṃ yad asmād bhavati bata mahāmṛtyurogā dravante daurbhāgyaṃ yāti nāśaṃ harati viṣajarāṃ yāti kāle bhramitvā // 3.2]
GR13goramaru:11: * jihvāgraṃ tv atha rājadantavivaraṃ nītvā tato ghaṇṭikāṃ saṃsthāpya pratijihvaparva śaśino mārge kalāṃ ca kṣipet // 4.1
GR13goramaru:12: * evaṃsāraṇike patanti ca sudhādhārāḥ punaḥ ṣaṇmukhagāndhārāpy atha tatkalāpamathanaṃ nāḍīmukhojjṛmbhaṇam // 4.2]
GR13goramaru:17: * nāsāpaścimamārgavāhapavanāt prāṇe 'tidīrghīkṛte candrāmbu pratisāraṇāṃ sukṛtinaḥ prāgghaṇṭikāyāḥ pathaḥ // 6.1
GR13goramaru:18: * siñcan kālaviśālavahnivaśagaṃ bhūtvā sa nāḍīśataṃ tat kāryaṃ kurute punar navatanuṃ jīrṇadrumaskandhavat // 6.2]
GR13goramaru:20: * protkṣiptaṃ vṛṣaṇasya golakayugaṃ madhye dhvajaṃ proddhvajaṃ nityordhve bata śaṅkhasāraṇavidhau vaktraṃ vidheyaṃ nijam // 7.1
GR13goramaru:21: * sarvasthānaśarīrabandhanavaśāt skandhoddhṛtānāṃ yathā nāḍīnāṃ mukhataḥ sudhānidhijalaṃ siñcann adho gacchati // 7.2]
GR13goramaru:26: * paścād āsanaśuddhavātanikarān ādāya kaṇṭhavraṇāt saṃsthāpyā ravimaṇḍale tu bhujagī saṃbhūtanāḍītrayāt // 9.1
GR13goramaru:27: * devī madhyapathoditā prakurute kampaṃ tato mūrchanāṃ dūrakarṣaṇadarśanaṃ śrutigaṇāṃś cānyā mahāsāraṇā // 9.2]
GR13goramaru:30: * tatraivāṅgulibhir nipīḍya kramaśaḥ śāntiṃ mano mārutaṃ candro yāti raviṃ tataś ca bhuvane tulyā mahāsāraṇā // 10.2
GR13goramaru:31: * sūryāntaḥ śaśivīcidantavadanaprāntaplavaughoragī saṃprāpte pavanātisaṅgaharaṇe kṣipraṃ tato dhāvitā // 10.3
GR13goramaru:32: * śrīmanmadhyapathāntato vidadhatī kampādi kopānvitā tasyaivāśrayayāyino 'pi śaśino dattā sudhā saṃmatā // 10.4
GR13goramaru:33: * ādau śoṣaṇiko 'tra sāraṇam ataḥ kāryaṃ mahāsāraṇaṃ kartavyaṃ pratisāraṇaṃ ca guruṇā nirdiṣṭamārgaṃ kramāt // 10.5
GR13goramaru:34: * paścād eva ca śaṅkhasāraṇavidhau kāryaṃ mahāsāraṇaṃ sammūrchā vitatākṛtiḥ pratidinaṃ velātrayaṃ dīyatām // 10.6
GR13goramaru:35: * ākuñcyāgajakāmarūpam acalaṃ bandhatvajātaṃ tanau nātyūrdhve caturaṅgulāgravidite sthāne hṛdā prāṇite // 10.7
GR13goramaru:36: * dantair bandhurite ca vātayugale praśleṣaṇāśleṣaṇāt nābhigranthivimokṣapātasahaje mārge manaḥsiddhayaḥ // 10.8
GR13goramaru:37: * dūrākāravisarpite ca pavane nābheś ca mārgasthite bandheṣu triṣu satsu so 'pi śithile madhyaprabodhe sati // 10.9
GR13goramaru:38: * kṣipraṃ ca dhriyate dvipīṭhamaruto 'py ūrdhvakramākarṣaṇe saṃyukto gaticittaśoṣaṇam ataḥ prāpye 'nile tiṣṭhati // 10.10
GR13goramaru:39: * mūle mūlordhvacakre vṛṣaṇakulatale vahnimātaṅgakūle kampakṣobhabhramāḍhye dhvanitaparicayaṃ gharmapātordhvaroma // 10.11
GR13goramaru:40: * bhūmityāgaṃ kavitvaṃ parapuraviśanaṃ vaśyam ākarṣaṇaṃ ca hy evaṃ vā cetanāptā prabhavati nikhilā khecaratvapratiṣṭhā // 10.12
GR13goramaru:41: * dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca tat // 10.13
GR13goramaru:42: * hṛdaye parame dhāmni madhye tu ravicandramāḥ // 10.14
GR13goramaru:43: * nādaṃ tu taṃ gṛhītvā ca caitanyaṃ tatra yojayet // 10.15
GR13goramaru:44: * dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca tat // 10.16
GR13goramaru:49: * vivaraś ca tṛtīyaḥ syāc chaṅkhaśabdaś caturthakaḥ // 10.21
GR13goramaru:54: * dhvanitena vinā yas tu nādaś caivam apaṇḍitaḥ // 10.26
GR13goramaru:59: * jīvaś caivāgnidāhaḥ syān mokṣaḥ samaraso bhavet // 10.31
GR13goramaru:63: * pañcame vāci kāmitvaṃ ṣaṣṭhe bhūmiṃ parityajet // 10.35
GR13goramaru:64: * saptame dūram ālokya cāṣṭame vajravad bhavet // 10.36
GR13goramaru:66: * pṛthvīmadhye bhavet pṛthvī cāpām āpas tathaiva ca // 10.38
GR13goramaru:67: * tejomadhye bhavet tejo vāyur vāyau pralīyate // 10.39
GR13goramaru:70: * tatrārūḍho yadā yogī prāpnuyāt paramaṃ padam // 10.42]
GR13goramaru:71: ayaṃ prakṛtibhedaḥ pṛthvī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśaś ca iti śarīre pañcaguṇāḥ mahābhūtāni bhavanti tatraiva tāni pañcavidhāni bhavanti // 11
GR13goramaru:72: asthi māṃsaṃ tvak nāḍī romāṇi iti pañcaguṇā pṛthivī // 12
GR13goramaru:74: kṣudhā tṛṣṇā nidrā ālasyaṃ kāntiś ca iti pañcaguṇaṃ tejaḥ // 14
GR13goramaru:75: dhāvanaṃ valganam ākuñcanaṃ prasāraṇaṃ nirodhaś ceti pañcaguṇo vāyuḥ // 15
GR13goramaru:76: rāgo dveṣo lajjā bhayaṃ mohaś ceti pañcaguṇa ākāśaḥ iti pañcaguṇālaṅkṛtāni pañcatattvāni // 16
GR13goramaru:77: śabdaḥ sparśaḥ rasaḥ rūpaṃ gandhaś ceti pañca bhūtaguṇāḥ // 17
GR13goramaru:84: asthisaṃcayaṃ ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ śatatrayam asty asya prāṇena saṃbandhaḥ // 24
GR13goramaru:89: vātaḥ prāṇaprakṛtiḥ pittaṃ hutāśanodbhūtaṃ śleṣmā nirodhāt bhavati // 29
GR13goramaru:90: tvak asṛk māṃsaṃ medaḥ asthi majjā śukraṃ prāṇo jīvaḥ śaktiḥ iti daśa dhātavaḥ // 30
GR13goramaru:91: prāṇarandhradvayaṃ locanarandhradvayaṃ karṇarandhradvayaṃ mukharandhradvayam utsargarandhradvayam iti daśa dvārāṇi // 31
GR13goramaru:92: atha daśamadvāraṃ dvividhaṃ śukramārgam amṛtaṃ kālamārgaś ceti brahmadaṇḍamūle raviśaśimadhye
GR13goramaru:93: bhagākāram asti tasmād āgatabrahmadaṇḍāśritaṃ paścimaliṅgam asti paścimaśabdena sthānam
GR13goramaru:95: puruṣāṇāṃ retomārgaḥ strīṇāṃ rajomārgaḥ sahaiva tena brahmadaṇḍarekhāśritapuṣpasamaye sarvavyāpakanāḍīsamūhāgataṃ kāminīrajaḥ sravati // 33
GR13goramaru:96: tatraiva kāmaviṣaharanirañjanānāṃ saṃyogaṃ bījapātāt ānandāgamaḥ pralayakālaviṣakālayoḥ kartā nirañjanaś ca iti // 34
GR13goramaru:104: manasy āśrayatāmeti jñeyaṃ śaktitrayaṃ tu tat // 42
GR13goramaru:105: śaktitrayodbhavaṃ bījaṃ bījāt kāmo viṣaṃ tataḥ // 43
GR13goramaru:106: kāmaḥ sṛṣṭitayā prokto viṣaṃ mṛtyupadaṃ bhavet // 44
GR13goramaru:107: kiṃ bahunā kāmaviṣaharanirañjanānāṃ brahmadaṇḍamūlāṅkure nivāsaḥ ebhir yad amukho mokṣaḥ bhasmībhūtasya dehasya punar āgamanakāryaṃ nāsti //
GR13goramaru:108: aho mūrkhatā lokasya kecid vadanti śubhāśubhakarmavicchedanaṃ mokṣaḥ // 46
GR13goramaru:115: kecid vadanti susamadṛṣṭinipātalakṣaṇo mokṣaḥ ity evaṃvidhabhāvanāśritalakṣaṇo mokṣo na bhavati // 53
GR13goramaru:116: atha mokṣapadaṃ kathyate yatra sahajasamādhikrameṇa manasā manaḥ samālokyate sa eva mokṣaḥ // 54
GR13goramaru:117: kāmaviṣaharasthānaṃ mānasodbhavaḥ manomadhye kāraṇaṃ kāraṇāt utpattisthitipralayāḥ pravartante // 55
GR13goramaru:121: iti jīvanmuktipadam anena mārgeṇa sthiratvaṃ bhavati // 59
GR13goramaru:123: ucyate tatra ādhāragranthaya ekadvitrayaś ceti ekadvitrayāṇāṃ madhye granthīnām upāntare
GR13goramaru:124: catuṣpatraṃ padmam adhomukhaṃ tiṣṭhati tatra karṇikāmadhye mṛṇālasūtraparimāṇā śaṅkhāvartā
GR13goramaru:125: tatra pravālāṅkurasannibhā dvitrināḍībhūtā kuṇḍalinī śaktiḥ caitanyabījamukhaṃ gatvā suptā // 60
GR13goramaru:131: iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva suṣumnā ca tṛtīyakā // 65
GR13goramaru:134: praṇītā sā hy anekais tu brahmāvartena saṃsthitā // 68
GR13goramaru:135: brahmadaṇḍacakreṇāsau kapālakarparaṃ yāvat tasmin kapālakarpare candramaṇḍalāntargataṃ
GR13goramaru:136: kapālaliṅgaṃ lampikāsthānordhve 'mṛtadhārām abhisravati mastakamadhye garbhe tiṣṭhati
GR13goramaru:137: tad evāmṛtaṃ rājadantamaye śaṅkhinī brahmadaṇḍatale damayitvā sravati // 69
GR13goramaru:138: ekaṃ mukharandhraṃ rājadantāntare etad eva śaṅkhinīmukhaṃ daśamadvāram ity ucyate // 70
GR13goramaru:139: yatra ca mūlabhagamaṇḍalānte kuṇḍalinī śaktir vinirgatā tatra vāmabhāgodbhavasomanāḍikā
GR13goramaru:140: dakṣiṇabhāgodbhavasūryanāḍikā candro vāmāṅgavyāpakaḥ sūryo dakṣiṇāṅgavyāpakaḥ candro
GR13goramaru:141: vāmāṅge vāmanāsāpuṭaṃ sūryo dakṣiṇāṅge dakṣiṇanāsāpuṭam ity evaṃ sūryacandrau vyavasthitau // 71
GR13goramaru:142: yatra mūlakande pavanodayaḥ manasa udayaḥ tapanodayaḥ jīvodayaḥ śabdodayaḥ mātṛkākṣarodayaś ceti // 72
GR13goramaru:149: mūrchitā sā śivaṃ vetti prāṇair evaṃ vyavasthitā // 79
GR13goramaru:150: janmāvasthānād adho liṅgaḥ sa cādhārakandajātimadhyasthito guhya ūrdhve bhavati tasyordhve
GR13goramaru:152: samāgacchati adhaḥpradeśe maṇipūrakasya dakṣiṇapaścimavarti amedhyasthānam madhye
GR13goramaru:153: nābheḥ kandaḥ tatra padmākṛtiḥ tatra śarīranāḍīnām ādhāraḥ kathyate hṛdaye pṛthivītattvaṃ
GR13goramaru:154: pītavarṇaṃ madhye kadambagolakākṛti tatra cittaviśrāntisthānaṃ tad eva analacakram
GR13goramaru:155: kaṇṭhe codakapravāhapūrṇam ātmatattvaṃ tad viśuddhisthānam tālumadhye dīpaśikhākāraḥ
GR13goramaru:156: sadoddyotaḥ tat tejastattvam kapālakandarāṅkure vāyutattvam nāsāgre ākāśatattvam tasyordhve
GR13goramaru:157: ājñāsthānam ājñāsthānāntare granthiṣoḍaśāntare amṛtā ṣoḍaśī kalā tadantare vālāgraśatadhāśrayā
GR13goramaru:158: ante tasyordhve kalānte binduḥ bindubhedād anantaraṃ śṛṃgāṭakākṛtir mastakasyoddeśas
GR13goramaru:159: tasmin cittalayasthānam cittasya śarīrabandhanādvayopetas trailokyavihāraḥ tasyāśritā
GR13goramaru:160: jñānaśaktiḥ evaṃ śaktitrayālaṃkṛtaś ciddarpaṇapratibimbaḥ samo vividhabhāvakalākalitaḥ
GR13goramaru:161: saṃsāraceṣṭāvalokanakuśalaḥ suptāvasthāyāṃ rūpī jalacandravat dṛśyate yaḥ sa paramātmā
GR13goramaru:162: sarvavyāpī maheśvaraḥ caturdaśavidhabhūtagrāmakartā ca iti so 'yaṃ paramātmā // 80
